DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate level antibody 1 year receive second vaccine dose two group adult age 60 : ( 1 ) previously receive 2 dos 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ( 13vPnC ) ( 2 ) previously receive 1 dose 13vPnc 1 dose 23-valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine ( 23vPS ) . This study also assess whether use 2 vaccine , 13vPnC 23vPS , administer different sequential order result different prolong antibody level . This study limit individual participate either study 6115A1-3010 ( NCT00574548 ) 6115A1-3005 ( NCT00546572 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Persistence Of Antibody Response Elicited By 13vPnC In Healthy Adults Previously Vaccinated
